Class Crashlytics.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crashlytics.android.Crashlytics.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Crashlytics

    public static class Crashlytics.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent API for creating Crashlytics instances.

    • Method Detail

      • delay

        @Deprecated
public Crashlytics.Builder delay(float delay)
        Deprecated. Use CrashlyticsCore.Builder.delay(float) and core(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsCore) instead.
        Specify the time (seconds) to wait before attempting to send any cached crash reports

      • listener

        @Deprecated
public Crashlytics.Builder listener(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsListener listener)
        Deprecated. Use CrashlyticsCore.Builder.listener(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsListener) and core(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsCore) instead.
        Specify a listener that listens to Crashes

      • pinningInfo

        @Deprecated
public Crashlytics.Builder pinningInfo(com.crashlytics.android.core.PinningInfoProvider pinningInfoProvider)
        Deprecated. Setting a PinningInfoProvider to use for sending crash reports has been deprecated.

      • disabled

        @Deprecated
public Crashlytics.Builder disabled(boolean isDisabled)
        Deprecated. Use CrashlyticsCore.Builder#disabled(boolean) and core(com.crashlytics.android.core.CrashlyticsCore) instead.

        Specify that this Crashlytics instance is disabled.

        This is useful in situations where you want to use Crashlytics in a production build, but want to disable it in debug or development builds. For example,

        new Crashlytics.Builder().disabled(BuildConfig.DEBUG).build();

      • answers
